greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the total number of positive integral solutions (x,y), order being taken into account, to the equation 1/x + 1/y + 1/z = 1/n.
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), May 23 2003
